home.trip-successful-description: On this trip, you spent {spentFuel}L of fuel, leaving you with {remainingFuel}L available.
home.assistance-has-arrived-and-your-spaceshi: Assistance has arrived, and your spaceship has been refueled. You're ready to continue your journey!
home.your-spaceship-has-been-successfully-ref: Your spaceship has been successfully refueled. Ready for the next journey!
home.you-cannot-reach-any-refueling-station-o: You cannot reach any refueling station or other planets with the remaining fuel. Click on the button to call for assistance.
home.you-are-on-a-planet-that-has-a-fuel-stat: You are on a planet that has a fuel station!
home.click-on-the-button-to-execute-the-refue: Click on the button to execute the refueling action on the spaceship.
home.mars-description: The Red Planet, target for missions.
home.uranus-description: Ice giant with a faint ring system.
